subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Thomas Voeckler wore the Tour de France overall leader’s jersey during a 10-day stretch in 2004, including Bastille Day. Now, on July 14, 2011, he is again dressed in yellow.
snippet: Thomas Voeckler wore the Tour de France overall leader’s jersey during a 10-day stretch in 2004, including Bastille Day. Now, on July 14, 2011, he is again dressed in yellow.
